en-US.name: Holiday Machine
en-US.summary: Adds a yuletide themed machine to the list of games you can play
en-US.description: This adds a yuletide machine featuring different sound effects and holiday symbols to the list of games you can play
examplePhrases: Alexa, give me the holiday machine

customProductPrompts.purchasePromptDescription: This will add the Holiday Machine to the list of slot machines you can play.
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: Congratulations! You can now access the Holiday Machine by saying select a new machine.

testingInstructions: After purchasing, the Holiday Machine will show up in the list of games you can play when you say Select a new machine
